name: get_file_metadata
description: Retrieve detailed metadata for a given file, including size, timestamps, permissions, and optional hash verification.

file_path.description: Path to the file whose metadata needs to be retrieved.

include_permissions.description: Include file permissions in the response (default: true).

hash_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm to use if include_hash=true. Options: 'md5', 'sha256' (default: 'md5').
